snippet: The general who took power after last month’s coup in Burkina Faso has been charged with crimes against humanity.
abstract: Burkina Faso military prosecutor Col Sita Sangare charges General Gilbert Diendere with crimes against humanity, latest allegations stemming from September Diendere-led failed coup; says 23 others, including general’s wife Fatou Diendere, have also been charged.
lead_paragraph: The general who took power after last month’s coup in Burkina Faso has been charged with crimes against humanity.

headline.main: Burkina Faso: New Charges in Coup
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burkina Faso: New Charges in Coup

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
